admin.description: Parent permission for permissions for builders and admins

ucz.description: Parent for permissions related to Under-Construction Zones

mark.description: Allows marking areas as Under-Construction Zones

builder.description: Parent permission for permissions for builders

selection.description: Parent permission for permissions related to selections

ccs.description: Allow the use of /ccs (command-controlled session) (permission to run commands using CCS are still dependent on the relevant permissions of those commands
